Chapter 1: 我喜欢和朋友聊天，他性格爽快，总是直来直去。我们相处得很和睦，气氛融洽，有时候我会附和他的意见，但也不会忽略自己的想法。瞬间的快乐让我觉得勤劳工作也值得。每次聚会都有佳肴，我巴不得每次都能去。他嚷嚷着说风度很重要，但我觉得别扭的时候也能理解。 I enjoy chatting with my friend, who is forthright and always straightforward. We get along harmoniously, and sometimes I chime with his opinions, but I never ignore my own thoughts. Moments of joy make hard work feel worthwhile. Every gathering has delicious food, and I am eager to go every time. He shouts about the importance of demeanor, but I can understand even awkward moments.
Chapter 2: 近来，我经常去咖啡馆，哪怕朋友唠叨，我也不会在意。美食的诱惑总是很大，我跨进咖啡馆的那一刻就感到温暖。团圆的感觉和店员的和蔼态度让我感到愉快。有时我会隐瞒一些小事，也会掩饰自己的情绪，不埋怨别人。虽然有些反常行为让人困惑，但我会熬过这些时刻，酝酿出自己的计划。 Recently, I often go to cafes, and even if friends chatter, I don’t mind. The temptation of good food is strong, and I feel warmth the moment I step in. The sense of reunion and the staff’s amiable attitude make me happy. Sometimes I conceal little things and hide my emotions without blaming others. Although some unusual behavior is confusing, I endure these moments and carefully plan ahead.
Chapter 3: 迎面走来的朋友让我迟疑，我打量他一番，搓着手略显紧张。虽然我流露出过于拘谨的表情，但他依然斯文而亲切。他操劳工作多年，却依旧朴实可靠，信誉良好。我惦记着他最近的成就，没有辜负努力。偶尔他炫耀自己灿烂的笑容，但我能感受到喜悦的真诚。 A friend walking towards me made me hesitate, and I looked him up and down, rubbing my hands nervously. Although I revealed an overly reserved expression, he remained gentle and refined. He has worked diligently for years but is still honest and reliable. I have been keeping track of his recent achievements, which have not disappointed. Occasionally, he flaunts his bright smile, but I can feel the genuine delight.
Chapter 4: 不料今天遇到意外事件，未免让人厌恶。悲惨的场景让人喘气，但猛烈的风暴也提醒我们打猎或生存的挑战。毫无准备的情况下，弊端暴露无遗，无非是动力不足。借助经验和不顾危险的勇气，人们仍旧能够乘机解决问题。面对可恶的困境，盯着目标不放，最终获得饶恕和释怀。 Unexpectedly, I encountered an incident today, which was rather detestable. The tragic scene made it hard to breathe, but the fierce storm reminded us of survival challenges. With no preparation, the drawbacks were fully exposed, nothing but a lack of motivation. With experience and courage regardless of danger, people can still take advantage of opportunities. Facing a hateful situation, keeping eyes on the goal leads to eventual forgiveness and relief.
Chapter 5: 我在机构工作，需要执行各种设置。固然任务繁重，但我勉强能够完成。有时候为了保护隐私，必须小心操作，避免崩溃和反感情绪。 I work at an organization and need to carry out various setups. Admittedly, the tasks are heavy, but I can manage them with effort. Sometimes, to protect privacy, I must operate carefully to avoid collapse and feelings of disgust.
Chapter 6: 作为一名教师，我敬业并传授知识。虽然有人吹牛或溜走，但我依然充满激情，努力发挥才干。不计较投诉，大不了完成指标。我和搭档成天讨论工作，当初创立团队的初心仍旧铭记于心，偶尔凑合也没关系。 As a teacher, I dedicate myself to work and impart knowledge. Even though some boast or sneak away, I remain passionate, striving to use my talents. I don’t mind complaints; at worst, I complete the targets. My partner and I discuss work all day, and the original purpose of establishing the team is still remembered, and occasionally doing things half-heartedly is okay.
Chapter 7: 在生活中，我们必须自己做主。虽然有时枯燥，但擅长的人能快速完成任务。急躁和顾虑可能致使错误，终身学习才是关键。并非所有人都能精确执行任务，挫折伴随意志成长，畏惧会随着日益经验减少。昔日企业倒闭，盈利下降，运行受阻，但及早抓住机遇和决策免疫失败。 In life, we must make our own decisions. Although sometimes dull, those who are skilled can complete tasks quickly. Irritability and misgivings may lead to mistakes; lifelong learning is key. Not everyone can perform tasks precisely; setbacks accompany the growth of willpower, and fear decreases with increasing experience. Former companies went bankrupt, profits fell, operations were blocked, but taking opportunities and making early decisions helps avoid failure.
Chapter 8: 我喜欢微笑的朋友，他有迷人的酒窝。最近新闻说有罪犯被通缉，而股市大跌让人跌入困境。医生谈论移植手术和器官分布图，阐述如何救治患者。面貌和疤痕的变化令人触动，崭新的科技呈现出极端可能，遥远的地区也有人思索和探索。 I like friends with dimples. Recently, the news said criminals were wanted, and the stock market plummeted, leaving people in trouble. Doctors discuss transplants and organ distribution maps, explaining how to treat patients. Changes in appearance and scars are touching, and brand-new technology presents extreme possibilities, even in distant areas where people ponder and explore.
Chapter 11: 他对细节很敏感，总能找到迹象。他操纵和操作事物非常熟练，对迷人的嗅觉和角落观察也十分精细。即使存在误差或缺陷，他仍然能够即时纠正。对于流浪的动物，他会拜访并饲养，清洁和喂养它们，凝视它们的动作，监视健康状况。他钻研操作技巧，操纵各种工具，敏捷灵敏而快活。 He is sensitive to details and can always find traces. He operates things skillfully, carefully observing scents and corners. Even if there are errors or flaws, he can correct them instantly. For stray animals, he visits and raises them, cleaning and feeding them, gazing at their actions, and monitoring their health. He studies operational techniques, manipulates tools, and is agile, keen, and cheerful.
Chapter 12: 在海边，我喜欢听白噪音和波浪声，观察岩石和海洋生物。神经紧张的患者听这些声音会愈加放松。嘈杂环境中，不妨试试白噪音，务必关注效果。延续的声音暗示着安全，也给予内心平静。 At the seaside, I like listening to white noise and the sound of waves, observing rocks and marine life. Nervous patients feel more relaxed listening to these sounds. In noisy environments, it’s no harm to try white noise, and be sure to monitor the effect. Continued sounds imply safety and give inner peace.
Chapter 13: 旅行时，我总带指南针和书籍，了解习俗和趣味。不同版本的书籍让人学习主流知识。经费和预算需要计划，一向有人作为向导和参谋帮助。起初旅行一度复杂，但便于携带和发行的资源使旅程顺利。偏僻地区的简要指南犹如指引，让人延伸视野。 When traveling, I always bring a compass and books to learn about customs and interests. Different editions of books help learn mainstream knowledge. Funding and budget need planning, and guides and advisors assist. Initially, the journey was complicated for a while, but resources that are convenient to carry and distribute make it smooth. Brief guides in remote areas act like guidance, extending one’s vision.
Chapter 14: 山间的庄家饲养牲畜，梯田和瀑布形成壮丽景色。宫殿和雕刻体现文化遗产，山脉依旧巍峨。生态保护和心血审美使景色茂盛而协调。时而我不禁陶醉于自然，铺开眼前的景象，采集美丽瞬间，开辟心灵空间。 In the mountains, farmers raise domestic animals; terraced fields and waterfalls create magnificent scenery. Palaces and sculptures represent cultural heritage, and the mountain ranges remain majestic. Ecology preservation and painstaking care for aesthetics make the scenery luxuriant and harmonious. Sometimes I cannot help being intoxicated by nature, unfolding the scene before my eyes, collecting beautiful moments, and opening up space for the mind.
Chapter 15: 我完成任务后，会仔细注视每个细节，辨认物品的来历，指望找到最好的材料。渴望的目标足以让我专注，我会认真琢磨，以便还原原貌。权威人士评估成效，证实计划是否成功。奔波于各地支撑团队，确保畅销产品和报酬合理。通过鉴别和识别能力，团队运作更加顺利。 After completing tasks, I carefully gaze at every detail, recognize the origin of items, and look forward to finding the best materials. The desired goal is enough to keep me focused, and I ponder carefully in order to restore original state. Authoritative figures assess effectiveness and confirm whether the plan is successful. Rushing around to support the team ensures best-selling products and fair pay. Through discernment and identification, the team operates more smoothly.
Chapter 16: 他端着水杯，瞄准目标，虽然迟钝，但盛满热茶的手微微颤抖。庞大的任务让我企图集中注意力，视线不停跳跃。姑且接受笨拙方法，但闪烁的光线提醒实力仍需提升。文雅举止和规律的新陈代谢使身体健康，名次评比靠毅力和深奥思索。 He held a cup, aimed at the target, and although slow-witted, his hand holding the hot tea trembled slightly. The huge task made me try to focus, with my line of vision jumping continuously. For the moment, I accept clumsy methods, but the flickering light reminds me that strength still needs improvement. Elegant manners and regular metabolism keep the body healthy, and rankings rely on willpower and deep thought.
Chapter 17: 陡峭的山坡土壤肥沃，植物茂盛。悬挂的藤蔓点缀其间，协调景色令人心旷神怡。负担虽重，但努力能维持秩序。水泥覆盖部分地面，照耀的阳光滋润万物。疲倦时随机停下休息，享受柔和景色。 The steep mountain slope has fertile soil, and plants grow luxuriantly. Hanging vines adorn the scenery, creating a harmonious view. Although burdens are heavy, effort can maintain order. Cement covers some ground, and sunlight illuminates and nourishes everything. When tired, I take a rest randomly and enjoy the mild scenery.
Chapter 18: 我喜欢喝茶，冲泡时会过滤茶叶渣，茶的香气和滋味让我放松。人们历来说茶能养心，即使丧失耐心也要忍受茶的苦味。我认定好茶值得等待，每一口都是享受。 I like drinking tea, and when brewing, I filter out tea leaves; the aroma and flavor of tea relax me. People all through ages have said tea can calm the heart. Even if patience is lost, one must endure the tea’s bitterness. I firmly believe that good tea is worth waiting for, and every sip is enjoyable.
Chapter 19: 在市场上，大家争夺限量商品，价格将近翻倍。买到的人会开心，进而分享消息，况且分享也是乐趣。我宁肯错过不必要的商品，也不想颇费力气排队。我会拣最需要的物品，维持理智，避免因贪婪而冲动。分裂的秩序提醒我，寻觅真正有价值的东西，而非夸张宣传。 At the market, everyone fights for limited items, with prices nearly doubling. Those who get them are happy and then share the news; moreover, sharing is also enjoyable. I would rather miss unnecessary items than exert too much effort standing in line. I pick what I truly need and maintain reason, avoiding impulsive decisions driven by greed. The split order reminds me to seek truly valuable things, not exaggerated advertising.
Chapter 20: 通过多年的学习和实践，我逐渐掌握知识，能够辨认、识别各种信息。端正心态，瞄准目标，尽管有迟钝和庞大任务，也能跳跃思考，间隔休息，姑且用笨拙方法完成。闪烁的思绪和实力让我不断琢磨，最终获得实惠成果。 Through years of study and practice, I gradually master knowledge and can discern and identify various information. Maintaining a proper attitude and aiming at the goal, despite slow-wittedness and huge tasks, I can think in leaps, take intervals of rest, and tentatively use clumsy methods. Flickering thoughts and strength allow me to ponder continuously, ultimately achieving practical results.
